name: Car Kass
description:
A downloadable game for Windows
from Global Game Jam 2020 made in 48 hours
with Construct 2

CAR KASS is a PvP Brawler playable up to 4 players.

Teams have 99 seconds to repair their vehicle. Mechanical parts appear at regular intervals, bring 5 and you win!

Hit your enemies and destroy your opponent's car to get the parts that have already been returned.

Use the bonuses that appear and throw projectiles at the opposing team to get the upper hand and win.

In the event of a draw, it's SUDDEN DEATH. The first team to return, or lose a part of their vehicle ends the game.

3, 2, 1, REPAIR ! Credits

Mangouffe - Sound Design
Nicolas Giraudet - Programmation & Game Design
Benjamin Giron - Game Design & Level Design
Louis-Dior Jin - Game Art
Thibault Legouet - Game Design & Level Design
Marceau Lièvremont - UX / UI & Game Design
